Title: Organizational Chart
Description: Please provide an organizational chart showing the corporate structure of the Target and all subsidiaries and affiliates.

Title: Joint Ventures
Description: Please provide copies of all joint venture agreements, partnership agreements or agreements involving the sharing of profits or technology of the Target, or joint marketing, development or distribution efforts by the Target.

Title: Governing Documents
Description: Please provide the applicable governing documents for the Target and all subsidiaries and affiliates (e.g., Articles of Incorporation, Articles of Organization, Bylaws, Operating/LLC Agreement, Articles of Association, etc.).

Title: Authorized Jurisdictions
Description: Please provide a list of all jurisdictions in which the Target and its subsidiaries and affiliates are licensed to do business.

Title: Board Minutes
Description: Please provide minutes and/or resolutions for all meetings of the board and shareholders/members, as applicable.

Title: Past Transactions
Description: Please provide copies of any contracts relating to any material acquisitions and/or divestitures of equity and/or assets (including via merger) completed by the Target within the past 5 years.

Title: Related Party Transactions
Description: Please provide a summary of all related party transactions entered into in the past 3 years, including the key terms thereof and review/approval procedures applicable thereto.

Title: Management Bios
Description: Please provide a professional biography for each member of the management team and any other key employees identified by Buyer.

Title: Board Bios
Description: Please provide professional biography for each member of the board.

Title: Capitalization Table
Description: For Target and each subsidiary and/or affiliate, please provide a capitalization table showing the number of shares outstanding and the number of shares owned by each shareholder.

Title: Equity Issuances
Description: Please provide documentation evidencing each issuance of equity for the Target and each subisidiary and/or affiliate.

Title: Options and Convertible Instruments
Description: Please provide a summary of all oustanding options, warrants, covertible notes, and any other right entitling the holder to obtain equity in the Target or any subisidiary or affiliate.

Title: Outstanding Debt
Description: Please provide a copy of all outstanding debt instruments.

Title: Litigation
Description: Please provide a summary of all material litigation.

Title: Licenses and Permits
Description: Please provide a summary of all permits, licenses, and other authorizations that are required for the Target to conduct its business and copies thereof, including any required export control licenses.

Title: Encumbrances
Description: Please provide copies of all agreements or instruments that place restrictions or encumbrances on assets (including property) of the Target (including security agreements and judicial or administrative orders).

Title: Material Contracts - Termination
Description: Please provide copies of all material contracts that are terminable upon a change of control or other corporate transaction.

Title: Material Contracts - Restrictive Covenants
Description: Please provide copies of all contracts that restrict the Target's right to conduct its business (e.g., non-compete, non-solicitation, geographical restriction, pricing restrictions/most favored nation, etc.).

Title: Material Contracts - Continuing Obligations
Description: Please provide copies of all contracts under which the Target has any continuing obligations (e.g., covenants, indemnification, etc.).

Title: Indemnification Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of all indemnification agreements between the Target and any officers

Title: Compliance Program
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's compliance program and copies of all policies, procedures and other documentation related thereto (e.g., code of conduct, anti-corruption, anti-trust, export control, etc.).

Title: Bad Actor Confirmation
Description: Please confirm that neither the Target nor any of its diretors, officers, or signifcant shareholders is subject to any of the "Bad Actor" disqualifications described under Rule 506(d) of the Securities Act.

Title: Export Control
Description: Please confirm that the Target is not
Priority: restricted from doing business under OFAC regulations or any other similar regulation.

Title: Sanctions
Description: Please confirm whether the Target has any direct or indirect presence and/or other engagements (including sales of product or the provision of services) involving any country or person subject to any embargo or sanctions imposed by the U.S. government or any other applicable governmental authority.

Title: Material Regulations
Description: Please provide a summary of all material regulations applicable to the Target and/or its business, including any anticipated changes thereto.

Title: Regulatory Correspondence
Description: Please provide copies of any material correspondence with any regulatory agencies or authorities.

Title: Product Recalls
Description: Please provide a summary of all product recalls conducted by the Target in the last 5 years.

Title: Warranty Claims
Description: Please provide a summary of all material warranty claims brought within the last 5 years.

Title: Property Summary
Description: Please provide a list of the address and description of each office, manufacturing, warehouse or other facility operated or maintained by the Target, including the amount of floor space, estimated remaining life and whether owned or leased.

Title: Deeds
Description: Please provide copies of deeds with respect to all owned real estate, including copies of all related title papers, title insurance policies, appraisals and surveys.

Title: Leases
Description: Please provide copies of all lease agreements.

Title: Purchase and Sale Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of all agreements related to the purchase and/or sale of real property consummated within the past five years.

Title: Customer List
Description: Please provide a list of the top 25 customers for each of the past 3 years, including revenue.

Title: Customer Terminations
Description: Please provide a list of all material customers that have ceased doing business with the Target in the past 12 months, including a description of the circumstances surrounding the termination of any such relationship.

Title: Sales Channel List
Description: Please provide a list of all material sales channel partners for each of the past 3 years, including revenue (e.g., sales reps and/or distributors).

Title: Sales Data
Description: Please provide a breakdown of sales and gross profits by: Product Type; Geography; Sales Channel.

Title: Customer Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all material customer contracts.

Title: Sales Channel Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all contracts with material sales channel partners (e.g., sales reps and/or distributors).

Title: Commission Contracts
Description: To the extent not previously provided, please provide copies of all contracts pursuant to which any third party is entitled to commissions or other payments.

Title: Government Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all contracts with government customers.

Title: Long Term Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all material contracts that have remaining terms longer than one year.

Title: Commercial Policies
Description: Please provide copies of policies and procedures related to credits, returns, warranty claims, etc.

Title: Pricing Policies
Description: Please provide copies of policies and procedures related to pricing.

Title: Strategic Plans
Description: Please provide copies of any strategic plans prepared for the Target.

Title: Marketing/Advertising Plans
Description: Please provide copies of any marketing/advertising plans prepared for the Target.

Title: Product Pipeline
Description: Please provide a summary of anticipated new products and/or product improvements.

Title: Advertising Materials
Description: Please provide copies of all brochures, presentations, sales sheet, and other advertising and/or marketing materials.

Title: Product Descriptions
Description: Please provide product descriptions for all material products and product lines.

Title: R&D Summary
Description: Please provide a summary of all ongoing R&D projects, including an estimated timeline for completion thereof.

Title: Marketing Assessment
Description: Please provide a summary of all marketing risks and opportunities identified by the Target.

Title: Supplier List
Description: Please provide a list of the top 15 suppliers for each of the past 3 years, including spend.

Title: Supplier Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all material supplier contracts.

Title: Subcontractor Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all material subcontractor contracts.

Title: Supplier Onboarding Process
Description: Please provide a summary of the policies and procedures utilized when evaluating and onboarding any new supplier or subcontractor and all documentation related thereto.

Title: Financial Statements - Audited
Description: Please provide copies of audited financial statements for the Target and each subsidiary and affiliates from 2019-2023.

Title: Financial Statements - Unaudited
Description: Please provide copies of unaudited financial statements for the Target and each subsidiary and affiliates for the applicable current fiscal year period(s).

Title: Off-Balance Sheet Transactions
Description: Please provide a detailed description of any off-balance sheet/statement of financial position items, liabilities or obligations of any nature (fixed or contingent) that are not shown or otherwise provided for in the Target's current financial statements.

Title: Contingent Liabilities
Description: Please provide a schedule and description of any contingent liabilities not disclosed or referred to in the financial statements.

Title: Prepaid Expenses
Description: Please provide a detailed schedule of the components of all prepaid expenses and deposits.

Title: Audit Letters
Description: Please provide copies of any letters issued by the Target's auditors during the last 5 years regarding the Target's accounting controls, method of accounting and other procedures, including all Management Representation Letters.

Title: Accounting Policies
Description: If the financial statements provided were not prepared in accordance with GAAP, please provide a summary of all key accounting policies necessary to the understanding of the financial statements.

Title: Changes to Accounting Policies
Description: Please provide a summary of all material changes to accounting policies adopted by the Target in the past 5 years and the reasons such changes were undertaken.

Title: Budgets
Description: Please provide copies of all budgets and operating plans prepared for the Target for at least the next 12 months.

Title: Projections
Description: Please provide copies of all financial projections prepared for the Target for at least the next 12 months.

Title: Cash Management
Description: Please provide a summary of any cash management controls and practices adopted by the Target.

Title: Investmet Policies
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's investment policies.

Title: Hedging
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's hedging policies, including copies of all contracts or instruments related thereto.

Title: Accounts Receivable - Aging
Description: Please provide a report reflecting all aged accounts receivable trial balances for Target.

Title: Inventory
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's inventory costing system and other procedures and policies related to inventory (e.g., counts, valuation, turnover, obsolescence, etc.).

Title: Bad Debts
Description: Please provide a detailed description of any bad debts and any agreements or arrangements that are expected to result in a loss to the Target.

Title: Reserves
Description: Please provide a schedule and detailed description of any reserves/contingency funds established for specific risk situations.

Title: Credit Support Obligations
Description: Please provide a current listing of standby letters of credit, performance bonds, performance guarantees and similar credit support obligations.

Title: Bank Statements
Description: Please provide copies of recent bank reconciliations and bank statements for all material bank accounts.

Title: Capital Expenditures - Past
Description: Please provide a summary of all material capital expenditure projects completed in the last 3 years, including any contracts or other documnentation related thereto.

Title: Capital Expenditures - Planned
Description: Please provide a summary of all capital expenditures planned in the next 12 months.

Title: Fixed Assets
Description: Please provide a current fixed asset register and/or copy of latest physical inventory of all equipment and other assets.

Title: Equipment
Description: Please provide a schedule of equipment split by capital vs. operating lease and provide copies of all lease agreements related thereto.

Title: Insurance Policies
Description: Please provide a summary of all current insurance coverages and copies of all policy documents related thereto.

Title: Insurance Claims Summary
Description: Please provide a summary of all claims made against any insurance policy within the last 5 years.

Title: Employment Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of all employment agreements and indicate those affected by the transaction (e.g., severance payments, termination, etc.).

Title: Consulting Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of all consulting agreements.

Title: Compensation Arrangements
Description: To the extent not already provided, please provide copies of all agreements relating to any compensation arrangements between the Target and any third party.

Title: Collective Bargaining Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of all collective bargaining agreements.

Title: Confidentiality and IP Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of all confidentiality, non-competition, nondisclosure, non-solicitation, intellectual property, or similar agreements.

Title: Severance Agreements
Description: Please provide copies of any severance agreements under which the Target has or may have outstanding liabilities whether as a result of the proposed transaction or otherwise.

Title: Recruiting Arrangements
Description: Please provide a summary of any current recruitment initiatives, including any financial commitments related thereto (e.g., payments due to recruitment agents in the instance that a candidate is successfully placed with the Target).

Title: Benefits Summary
Description: Please provide a summary of all benefits.

Title: Benefit Plans
Description: Please provide copies of plan documents for all benefit plans, including copies of all Form 5500 or other applicable regulatory filings for the past 5 years.

Title: Compensation Policy
Description: Please provide a copy of the Target's compensation policy.

Title: Bonus Plans
Description: Please provide details of bonus or other profit-related schemes and details of beneficiaries/participants.

Title: Stock Option Plans
Description: Please provide a summary of all incentive stock option plans and copies of any plan documents related thereto.

Title: Stock Option Awards
Description: Please provide a summary of all outstanding stock option awards and copies of any award documents related thereto.

Title: Pension Plans
Description: Provide a list and detailed summary of all pension pension plans.

Title: Employee Litigation
Description: Please provide a summary of all litigation against the Target brought by any current or former employee in the last ten 10 years (e.g., discrimination, etc.).

Title: Judgements and Awards
Description: Please provide a description of any court judgement or current employment tribunal award in respect of any employee dispute within the past 12 months.

Title: Disciplinary Proceedings
Description: Please provide details of any disciplinary proceedings taken against an employee or grievance brought by an employee in the past 3 years, whether brought under the Target's disciplinary or grievance procedure or otherwise.

Title: Investigations
Description: Please provide a summary of any investigations and proceedings by authorities relating to employment matters, including the results thereof (e.g., administrative decrees, judgments, decisions, opinions or settlement agreements issued or entered into either for or against the Target).

Title: Headcount
Description: Please provide a headcount by function and location.

Title: Suspended Employees
Description: Please provide a schedule of any employees suspended â€“ including reasons for suspension and salary implications.

Title: Dismissed Employees
Description: Please provide a schedule of employees dismissed in the last 12 months (including details of why) and any potential constructive dismissals.

Title: Absentee Reports
Description: Please provide a schedule of all employees absent from work due to disability, long-term illness, or otherwise.

Title: Disabled Employees
Description: Please provide a schedule of employees covered by any disability legislation applicable in the jurisdiction in which the Target operates.

Title: Employee Policies
Description: Please provide copies of all employee handbooks and other employee policies.

Title: Hiring Policies
Description: Please provide a detailed summary of the Target's hiring practices and policies, including use of background checks, verification of immigration status, and any other applicable policies.

Title: Changes to Employee Policies
Description: Please provide a summary of any changes that have been agreed within the past 12 months or that are contemplated in relation to terms and conditions, handbooks, policies, benefits and redundancy arrangements and the date that any such changes will come into force.

Title: Employee Loans
Description: Please provide a detailed schedule of any loans granted to employees (terms/conditions/tax implications) and all sums owed.

Title: Patents and Trademarks
Description: Please provide a summary of all patents and registered trademarks held by the Target.

Title: Domain Names
Description: Please provide a schedule of all websites and domains owned or run by the Target and any terms and conditions related thereto.

Title: Licensing Agreements - Incoming
Description: Please provide copies of all agreements under which the Target is granted the right to use IP owned by a third party.

Title: Licensing Agreements - Outgoing
Description: Please provide copies of all agreements under which a third party is granted the right to use IP owned by the Target.

Title: Jointly-Owned IP
Description: Please provide a summary of any IP that is not solely owned by the Target (e.g., joint ownership, non-exclusive license, etc.), including any contracts or other documentation related thereto.

Title: Infringement
Description: Please provide a summary of any past or current instances where any third party actually or allegedly infringed on the Target's IP or where the Target actually or allegedly infringed on a third party's IP.

Title: IP Restrictions
Description: Please provide a detailed summary of any restrictions to which IP assets of the Target are subject.

Title: IP Litigation
Description: Please provide a summary of all IP litigation in which the Target is or has been involved, including the current status or outcome thereof (e.g., court orders, settlements, etc.).

Title: IP Development
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's process for generating/developing, recognizing, capturing, and protecting (for instance, via patents) IP assets.

Title: IT Projects
Description: Please provide details of any current and planned IT initiatives/key projects - including details of key benefits to be realized, capital budget, total budget, time and cost incurred to date and estimated time and cost to completion.

Title: Key IT Resources
Description: Please provide a summary of all key IT resources (hardware/software/people) and the extent to which the Target depends on any such resources.

Title: Software
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's policies and practices regarding the purchase and maintenance of software (e.g. (i) how often is software purchased (ii) who makes the purchase (iii) is software renewed and renegotiated on an annual basis).

Title: Material Software
Description: Please provide a summary of all material software utilized by the Target.

Title: Hardware
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's policies and practices regarding the purchase and maintenance of IT hardware (e.g. (i) how often is hardware purchased and (ii) who makes the purchase).

Title: Material Hardware
Description: Please provide a summary of all material hardware utilized by the Target, including the physical location thereof.

Title: Technical Architecture
Description: Please provide a diagram of the Target's technical architecture including servers, storage devices, operating systems and databases.

Title: System Networks
Description: Please provide a detailed description of the networking systems utilized by the Target, including a depiction of topology, inventory, connectivity, bandwith, instances of downtime in the past 12 months, etc.

Title: Hardware Configurations
Description: Please provide a summary of an specific hardware configurations utilized by the Target.

Title: IT Support Services
Description: Please provide a summary of any vendor support or other support services to which the Target is entitled or that the Target utilizes, including any contracts or other documentation related thereto.

Title: IT Maintenance
Description: Please provide a summary of annual costs associated with maintenance of IT hardware for the past 3 years, including details related to the replacement and/or upgrade of such hardware.

Title: IT Contracts
Description: Please provide copies of all material contracts related to software and/or IT services obtained by the Company.

Title: IT Services
Description: Please provide a summary of services provided by all external IT contractors/consultants and copies of all contracts related thereto.

Title: Growth
Description: Describe the capacity for growth in the Target's current IT environment. If IT is being fully utilized to what extent is investment required to support intended future growth?

Title: IT Acquisition
Description: Please provide a summary of how technology acquired by the Target, including sourcing methods and delegation of responsibility therefor.

Title: Help Desk
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's support/help desk effectiveness and approach (e.g., in-house or out-sourced).

Title: IT Strategy
Description: Provide a summary of the role of technology/IT in the Target's strategic plan.

Title: Automation
Description: Describe the level of automation made possible via the Target's IT systems (software & hardware) and the sufficiency of such capabilities given the Target's business.

Title: Web-based Applications
Description: Please provide a description of any web-based or internet facing applications hosted by the Target.

Title: Security Protocols
Description: Please provide a detailed description of the key security protocols adopted by the Target.

Title: Disaster Recovery
Description: Please provide a detailed description of the Target's policies and procedures related to backups and/or disaster recovery, including all documentation related thereto.

Title: Data Privacy
Description: Please provide a detailed description of the Target's data privacy policies and procedures, including all documentation related thereto.

Title: Sensitive Information
Description: Please provide a summary of all personal and/or sensitive information held and/or processed by the Target, including information about users that have access to such information and policies and procedures regarding protection thereof.

Title: Stress Test Results
Description: Please provide the results of any stress test analysis undertaken by the Target, including the resolution of any issues identified.

Title: Other IT Security Testing
Description: Please provide a summary of all monitoring measures/tests conducted by the Target to ensure IT security systems are working as expected.

Title: Summary of Security Issues
Description: Please provide a detailed summary of any logged security issues, including all actions taken to remedy such issues.

Title: Data Storage
Description: Please provide a detailed summary of the Target's policies and procedures regarding data storage (e.g., devices utilized, use of cloud storage, security measures, capacity, etc.).

Title: Data Encryption
Description: Please provide a summary of the Target's policies and practices regarding data encryption.

Title: E-mail Vulnerabilities
Description: Please provide a summary of any issues or concerns related to the Target's use of e-mail, including loss of confidential information, inappropriate or malicious content, etc.

Title: Anti-Virus Protection
Description: Please provide a summary of any anti-virus and/or anti-malware protections utilized by the Target.

Title: Attacks/Intrusions
Description: Please provide a detailed description of any cyber attacks/intrusions that the Target has been subjected to in the past 12 months.

Title: Mobile Device Security
Description: Please provide a summary of all policies and procedures utilized by the Target to manage the security of mobile devices.
